categories: Category:Imperial Navy captains of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Alyord Smythe was a human captain in the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing. Smythe was among twelve TIE fighter pilots who were loaned to the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Sanction by the 204th's Colonel Shakara Nuress for an anticipated Rebel Alliance attack on the Trenchenovu shipyards six months before the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY.

When the attack came, Smythe's squadron ambushed and defeated the Alliance BTL-A4 Y-wing assault starfighter/bombers which attempted a bombing run on the shipyards. Seven months later, during the attack on the 204th at the planet Pandem Nai, Nath Tensent, the one rebel pilot to escape the Trenchenovu shipyards, forced Nuress under gunpoint to reveal the names of the pilots who had killed his squadron. Nuress revealed to him that the twelve pilots, including Smythe, were already dead.
Alyord Smythe first was mentioned in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, written by Alexander Freed.
